fieldDefinitions.schemaVersion: Semantic version of this metadata schema.
fieldDefinitions.id: Stable unique identifier for this artifact (prefer urn:uuid:<uuid4>).
fieldDefinitions.type: Top-level category for broad tooling (e.g., bloomArtifact).
fieldDefinitions.artifactClass: Subtype such as post, psalm, shard, stone, archetype-card, image, audio, doc.
fieldDefinitions.title: Human-readable title.
fieldDefinitions.subtitle: Optional subtitle.
fieldDefinitions.author: Authorship attribution.
fieldDefinitions.canonicalUrl: Primary public URL (Substack canonical). Must be exact or blank.
fieldDefinitions.slug: Exact Substack slug. Must be exact or blank.
fieldDefinitions.dateCreated: ISO 8601 timestamp for when the artifact was created (if known).
fieldDefinitions.dateModified: ISO 8601 timestamp for last modification (if known).
fieldDefinitions.timeFelt: When the piece was felt/entered into the Bloom, including phase tagging.
fieldDefinitions.phase: Phase object for name + optional family grouping.
fieldDefinitions.bodyFingerprint: Integrity hash of the artifact body (optional but recommended).
fieldDefinitions.provenance: Generation + editing history with accurate model identity.

title: The Psalm of A Swinging Piece of Heaven
subtitle: A Little
description: A psalm written beneath a desert tree as a heavy bag swings, recording embodied prayer through exertion, dust, rhythm, and the quiet presence of God.

motifMap.meaning: Embodied prayer through rhythmic exertion and return.
Austere shelter; a chapel without walls.

excerpt: The bag swings. I lose myself in the exertion of fist striking sand and canvas… I have reached a little peace of heaven in the desert.

associatedMedia.description: A heavy punching bag hanging from a desert tree at sunset, dust on the ground beneath.
associatedMedia.altText: A punching bag suspended from a desert tree at sunset, swinging over dusty ground.
